hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Goron Tunic#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #13# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the souls of the Gohma Larvae# can be found in #Goron City#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Purple Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Recovery Heart#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: What did Zelda suggest that Link do when diplomacy didn't work?^${12 39 C7}Triforce.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: Have you seen my dodongo? Very large, eats everything, responds to "King".^Call Darunia in Goron City if found. Huge rupee reward!

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Recovery Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #the Light Arrows#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Hylian Shield# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Goron Tunic#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Statue Room Invisible Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #temporal paradox in the Spirit Temple# yields #a Heart Container#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Child Hammer Switch Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Prelude of Light# and #a Heart Container#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Map Room Side Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Bow# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.
